segments.text: Hello , again . Did you discuss everything with your colleagues ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes . It seems that everything is settled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you decided how you would like the salaries paid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have discussed it and decided that at the moment we would like the salaries to be paid into the employees's accounts , whether they are currently with this bank or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , if we are happy with the service after the initial period we will recommend all employees either transfer their accounts to this bank , or open new accounts with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . We always welcome new customers .
segments.speaker: S1
